CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Waste Non Infra",FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Water Non Infra"),NOT(ISBLANK(FSM_Polygon__c )),VALUE(TEXT( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority))>=3),12,IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"1"),15, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"2"),13.5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"3"),12, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"4"),10.5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"5"),9, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"6"),7.5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"7"),6, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"8"),4.5, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"9"),3, IF (ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority,"10"),1.5,0)))))))))))
CustomField.label: Priority Score
